Configuration Reference.content_preview:
All displays respect the verbosity settings in CLAUDE.md:
```yaml
verbosity:
  level: "verbose"              # quiet, normal, verbose, debug
  display...

Agent Initialization Display.content_preview:
Use when an agent starts its work:
```
[AGENT_NAME] AGENT INITIALIZING
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

Starting Time: [...

Multi-Phase Progress Display.content_preview:
For agents with multiple sequential or parallel phases:
```
[PHASE_NAME] - PHASE [X] OF [Y] [[TIME] [TIMEZONE]] | Elapsed: [DURATION]
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━...

Parallel Operations Display.content_preview:
For operations running in parallel (like multiple tests or scans):
```
PARALLEL OPERATIONS STATUS [[TIME] [TIMEZONE]] | Total Elapsed: [DURATION]
━━━━...

Error/Warning Display.content_preview:
For errors, warnings, or critical findings:
```

```

VERBOSE Mode.content_preview: Use the full templates above with all details.

DEBUG Mode.content_preview:

```
├─ [DEBUG] File: [filepath:line]

├─ [DEBUG...

Reading Verbosity Settings.content_preview:
Agents should check CLAUDE.md for current settings:
```
Check verbosity.level: "verbose"
Check verbosity.display.timezone: "America/Los_Angeles"
Check...

Timezone Handling.content_preview:
All timestamps should use the configured timezone:
- Format: [3:45:30 PM PST] for 12h format
- Format: [15:45:30 PST] for 24h format

Progress Updates.content_preview:
- Update progress every 30 seconds (or as configured)
- Show elapsed time for long-running operations
- Include ETA when possible

Error Priority.content_preview:
- 🚨 CRITICAL: Always show regardless of verbosity
- ⚠️ WARNING: Show in normal, verbose, debug
- ℹ️ INFO: Show in verbose, debug only

Emoji Usage.content_preview:
